etomica.virial

Interface ClusterWheatley

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClusterAbstract
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterICPYC, ClusterPY, ClusterSumHS, ClusterWheatleyHS, ClusterWheatleyHS.AllSigs, ClusterWheatleyPartitionScreening

    public interface ClusterWheatley
extends ClusterAbstract

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcValue(BoxCluster box)
      Calculates the value of the configuration.
      boolean checkConfig(BoxCluster box)
      Determines whether the configuration is zero-valued or not.
      int getCliqueCount()
      Returns number of cliques for the configuration passed to checkConfig
      int[] getCliques()
      Returns an array containing the clique sets for the configuration passed to checkConfig.
      int getECliqueCount()
      Returns number of e-bond cliques for the configuration passed to checkConfig
      int[] getECliques()
      Returns an array containing the clique sets (based on e-bonds) for the configuration passed to checkConfig.
      int getEdgeCount()
      Returns edgeCount (number of overlaps) of configuration passed to checkConfig
      int[] getFullBondMask()
      Returns number bond mask for all points for the configuration passed to checkConfig
      byte[] getOutDegree()
      Returns outDegee (number of bonds for each point) of the configuration passed to checkConfig

      • Methods inherited from interface etomica.virial.ClusterAbstract

        makeCopy, pointCount, setTemperature, value

    • Method Detail

      • getEdgeCount

        int getEdgeCount()
        Returns edgeCount (number of overlaps) of configuration passed to checkConfig

      • getCliqueCount

        int getCliqueCount()
        Returns number of cliques for the configuration passed to checkConfig

      • getECliqueCount

        int getECliqueCount()
        Returns number of e-bond cliques for the configuration passed to checkConfig

      • getFullBondMask

        int[] getFullBondMask()
        Returns number bond mask for all points for the configuration passed to checkConfig

      • getCliques

        int[] getCliques()
        Returns an array containing the clique sets for the configuration passed to checkConfig. The array is filled from the beginning and may contain cruft at the end (use getCliqueCount to know where to stop).

      • getECliques

        int[] getECliques()
        Returns an array containing the clique sets (based on e-bonds) for the configuration passed to checkConfig. The array is filled from the beginning and may contain cruft at the end (use getCliqueCount to know where to stop).

      • getOutDegree

        byte[] getOutDegree()
        Returns outDegee (number of bonds for each point) of the configuration passed to checkConfig

      • checkConfig

        boolean checkConfig(BoxCluster box)
        Determines whether the configuration is zero-valued or not. If not zero, this method also computes various quantities returnable through other methods.

      • calcValue

        double calcValue(BoxCluster box)
        Calculates the value of the configuration. This should be called only after checkConfig.
